tool.name: analyze_robust_elements_tool
tool.description: Specialized tool for extracting structural elements from document images with precise bounding box coordinates. ONLY use for: document structure analysis with coordinate requirements, layout element identification with positioning, page component extraction with spatial data. Returns JSON with elements array containing order, type, level, content, and bbox (x1, y1, x2, y2) for each element. NOT for: simple element extraction without coordinates, content analysis, text extraction, metadata extraction. If no structural elements are found, returns that no document elements were detected.

image_path.description: Absolute file path to the image containing document for structural elements analysis with coordinates. Supports common image formats (PNG, JPG, etc.)

aws_profile.description: Optional AWS profile name for Bedrock authentication. If not provided, uses default AWS credentials

audit_mode.description: When true, includes confidence scoring and human review flags in the analysis output

analyzer.name: robust_elements_analyzer
analyzer.description: Analyzes document structure and extracts elements with precise bounding box coordinates

core.text: Were all visual elements correctly identified?
Was the content understood within its surrounding context?
What elements were missed or incorrectly represented?

tool_specific.text: Were elements correctly classified by type?
Were coordinate values precise and consistent?
